participant_1.background: i am 19 and i cannot wait to move out 19 my parents home. i just want to have fun with my friends. i do not drink or do drugs or anything. i work took i've a part time job at burger king.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Caring and laid-back, Jake enjoys the simple pleasures of life, especially spending time with his dog and watching sports.
participant_2.background: i've a german shepherd dog. i live is a rural farming community. my husband is adopted. i like to watch nhl hockey.

content.text: i am a little tired from work
me too. after a long day of work, i like to watch hockey. what about you?
